This vibrant duo includes two meticulously designed jars with lids and matching spoons, elegantly perched on a flowing ceramic tray. The striking combination of rich red tones and intricate black-and-white patterns reflects the traditional craftsmanship of Khurja artisans, making this set a stunning centerpiece for any table.
Each jar is crafted from high-quality ceramic, ensuring durability while maintaining a polished, refined finish. The handcrafted detailing, evident in the swirling leaf motifs, adds a unique flair that elevates the aesthetic appeal of this set. Perfectly sized for holding spices, sauces, or pickles, these jars offer both functionality and style, making them a versatile addition to your kitchen or dining space.
The ergonomic design of the spoons and lids ensures ease of use, while the matching tray keeps everything neatly organized. sellingProducts.name: sunshine-mug
sellingProducts.description:
a ceramic mug featuring a cheerful sunshine design. This is typically handmade, often using techniques like wheel-throwing, resulting in a unique and tactile item. These mugs are frequently made of stoneware and are generally microwave and dishwasher safe. The design features stylized suns, often in bright yellow or orange colors on a light-colored background
 an Oustao ceramic bowl, specifically a (Sun) design. 
Here's some information about this product for shopping:
Brand and Design:
It's a ceramic bowl from Oustao, a Marseille-based brand known for decorative objects with a Mediterranean influence. The design features hand-painted sun motifs, giving it the designation. 
Material and Durability:
Oustao products are handmade in artisanal workshops in Portugal and are designed to be durable, made of thick porcelain, and resistant to daily wear.

sellingProducts.description: Our fish wooden tray comes with two removable pieces with a basic plate, hand-carved out of Sheesham wood by Egyptian artisans in Hegaza, in Qena governorate. Eco-friendly, and suitable for picnics, serving nuts, and each can be used separately.

sellingProducts.name: Sheesham Wooden Plate
sellingProducts.description: Our Sheesham eco-friendly wooden plate comes in five separable pieces attached with a removable down tray, hand-carved by Egyptian artisans in Hegaza village, in Qena governorate. Suitable for picnics, catering, or serving snacks.

sellingProducts.name: Fan Wooden Platter
sellingProducts.description: Own our eco-friendly 6 pieces fan shaped nuts wooden tray coming with a separable plate for your own use, hand-carved with Sheesham wood by Egyptian artisans in Hegaza in Qena governorate. Durable and perfect for serving nuts or any kind of various snacks.
